name: chassis
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the frame of a vehicle, usually including the wheels and engine, onto which the metal covering is fixed: The car's lightweight chassis is made from aluminium sheets.

the frame of a vehicle, including the wheels and engine, which supports the upper, covering part
